page.title: 01GAZETTE OF CURY/GUNWALLOE
page.content: The area under survey is situated in the North Western corner ofthe Lizard Peninsula; bounded to the West by the English Channel (Mounts Bay);to the North by Loe Bar Lake and the town of Helston;to the East by the main Helston/Lizard road and part of the R.N.A.S.CULDROSE;and to the South by the village of Mullion. It is mainly an area of scattered Dairy Farms,small villages,hamlets,and isolated cottages/houses/bungalows. The area is primarily Grassland with comparatively few acres used for crops and mixed farming. There is little or no industry other than farming.There are very few amenities. The local population visit Helston for immediate amenities or Falmouth, Truro,Plymouth for major amenities. An area of quiet natural beauty with an outstanding coastline.
